bedrockDialogueEditor.name: Bedrock Dialogue Editor
bedrockDialogueEditor.autoOpen.title: Auto Open
bedrockDialogueEditor.autoOpen.desc: Automatically open dialogue files in the node editor.
Switch focus to the dialogue editor tab when opening.

This only has an effect if `editorOpenLocation` is set to `beside`.
bedrockDialogueEditor.editorOpenLocation: The column that the dialogue editor should open in when called from `openNodeEditor`.
The dialogue editor opens in the *active* view column.
The dialogue editor opens in the view column *next* to the active one.
